doc.title: A Discordant Note
doc.plot: The pleasures of a company assembled in a private house are interrupted by a young man who persists in singing. One of the men, aggravated beyond all restraint, seizes the amateur vocalist and throws him bodily out of the window. The scene then changes to the front of the house, where the young man is seen crashing through the window and landing in a heap on the lawn below.
